entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who will take tokens and drink a potion to transform into Mafalda Hopkirk. ("You'd better take this, Hermione, and here are the tokens")

entities.name: mafalda hopkirk
entities.description: Mafalda Hopkirk is mentioned as a witch who has been transformed into by Hermione using Polyjuice Potion. ("Hermione drank the Polyjuice Potion, which was now a pleasant heliotrope color, and within seconds stood before them, the double of Mafalda Hopkirk")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as checking his watch and hurrying to close the door. ("Harry checked his watch. Were running late, Mr. Magical Maintenance will be here any second")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as throwing an Invisibility Cloak over himself along with Harry. ("Harry and Ron threw the Invisibility Cloak over themselves but Hermione remained in view, waiting")

entities.name: mr. magical maintenance
entities.description: Mr. Magical Maintenance is mentioned as someone who will arrive soon. ("Were running late, Mr. Magical Maintenance will be here any second")
